title: President Donald J. Trump Wants to Protect Patients and Their Families From Surprise Billing – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Healthcare	

Issued on:
May 9, 2019
The seen and unseen costs of healthcare are still taking an enormous toll on millions of American families.
						President Donald J. Trump					LIFTING THE BURDEN OF SURPRISE BILLING: President Donald J. Trump is putting forward principles to address the problem of surprise billing in healthcare. PROTECTING PATIENTS: President Trump wants to ensure patients are not taken advantage of and have the price information they need to make informed decisions. COMMITTED TO LOWERING COSTS: Combating surprise billing will build on the numerous actions President Trump has taken to put patients in control and lower the costs they face.
